text: Ryan Bradley (born October 26, 1975) is a former Major League Baseball pitcher. He bats and throws right-handed. Bradley was drafted by the New York Yankees in the 1st round of the 1997 Major League Baseball Draft, he was drafted 40th overall. He played only in with the Yankees. He had a 2-1 record in 5 games, with a 5.86 ERA. He attended Arizona State University. ==External links== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Arizona State Sun Devils baseball players Category:Baseball players from California Category:Major League Baseball pitchers Category:New York Yankees players Category:People from Covina, California
title: Ryan Bradley (baseball)
